message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I value our potential partnership, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $9,750. This would still allow me to make a fair profit, and I believe it's still a great deal for you.  Let's see if we can close this deal!

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for considering my budget constraints. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle and allows us to reach an agreement.
